SELECT COUNT(*) totcnt FROM COMTN_BACKUP_OPERT A LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT CODE, CODE_NM FROM COMTC_CMMN_DETAIL_CODE WHERE CODE_ID = 'COM049') B ON A.CMPRS_SE = B.CODE LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT CODE, CODE_NM FROM COMTC_CMMN_DETAIL_CODE WHERE CODE_ID = 'COM047') C ON A.EXECUT_CYCLE = C.CODE WHERE A.USE_AT = 'Y'
AND A.BACKUP_OPERT_NM LIKE '%'|| #{searchVO.searchKeyword} ||'%'
AND A.BACKUP_ORGINL_DRCTRY LIKE '%'|| #{searchVO.searchKeyword} ||'%'

SELECT A.BACKUP_OPERT_ID , A.EXECUT_CYCLE , C.CODE_NM AS "executCycleNm" , A.EXECUT_SCHDUL_DE , A.EXECUT_SCHDUL_HOUR , A.EXECUT_SCHDUL_MNT , A.EXECUT_SCHDUL_SECND , A.BACKUP_OPERT_NM , A.BACKUP_ORGINL_DRCTRY , A.BACKUP_STRE_DRCTRY , A.CMPRS_SE , B.CODE_NM AS "cmprsSeNm" , A.LAST_UPDT_PNTTM AS "lastUpdusrPnttm" , A.LAST_UPDUSR_ID , A.FRST_REGISTER_ID , A.FRST_REGIST_PNTTM AS "frstRegisterPnttm" FROM COMTN_BACKUP_OPERT A LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT CODE, CODE_NM FROM COMTC_CMMN_DETAIL_CODE WHERE CODE_ID = 'COM049') B ON A.CMPRS_SE = B.CODE LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT CODE, CODE_NM FROM COMTC_CMMN_DETAIL_CODE WHERE CODE_ID = 'COM047') C ON A.EXECUT_CYCLE = C.CODE WHERE A.USE_AT = 'Y' AND A.BACKUP_OPERT_ID = #{backupOpertId}

SELECT A.BACKUP_OPERT_ID , A.EXECUT_SCHDUL_DFK_SE , B.CODE_NM AS "executSchdulDfkSeNm" FROM COMTN_BACKUP_SCHDUL_DFK A LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT CODE, CODE_NM FROM COMTC_CMMN_DETAIL_CODE WHERE CODE_ID = 'COM074') B ON A.EXECUT_SCHDUL_DFK_SE = B.CODE WHERE A.BACKUP_OPERT_ID = #{backupOpertId}
